text: My Favourite Brunette is a 1947 American romantic mystery comedy movie directed by Elliott Nugent and starring Bob Hope, Dorothy Lamour, Peter Lorre, Lon Chaney, Jr., John Hoyt, Charles Dingle, Reginald Denny, Willard Robertson, Jack La Rue. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 romantic comedy movies Category:1947 mystery movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies directed by Elliott Nugent Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: My Favorite Brunette
